title: Insomnia
creator_credit: United States. Dept. of the Navy
brief_description: This US Navy Training Film looks at the problem of insomnia, and the personal distress which it can cause. Indicates that the problem is widespread, suggests ways of alleviating it, and stresses individual differences.
